maiet.SCRIPT:
--[[ 어둠의 종속자 --]]
function NPC_111034:Init(NPCID) NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 4); NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_1 = 211103414 -- 성스러운폭발 NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_2 = 211103413 -- 독구름 폭풍 NPC_111034.PhaseChangeNO = 0
end
function NPC_111034:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 4 do this:SetUserData( i, 0 ) end -- for end
function NPC_111034:PhaseChange( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- 페이즈 1+2 될 때 바둥거리는거 한번만 하기 --GLog( "NPC_512000:PhaseChangeNO\n" )
if NPC_111034.PhaseChangeNO == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103410 ) NPC_111034.PhaseChangeNO = 1 end
end
function NPC_111034:Phase1_dummyspawn( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- 더미 소환(도너츠 형) --GLog( "NPC_512000:SpawnGroundOfDarkness\n" ) local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3(0,0,0) ) local Minion = AsNPC(ThisNPC):SummonNow( 111036, WorldPos ) AsNPC(ThisNPC):SetTarget( Minion ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( 211103450 )
end
function NPC_111034:Phase2_dummyspawn( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- 더미 소환(이동형) --GLog( "NPC_512000:SpawnGroundOfDarkness\n" ) local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3(0,0,0) ) local Minion = AsNPC(ThisNPC):SummonNow( 111037, WorldPos ) AsNPC(ThisNPC):SetTarget( Minion ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( 211103451 ) end
function NPC_111034:BreakPart01( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- 날개 파괴 --ThisNPC:BreakPart(3, Enemy) end
function NPC_111034:BreakPart02( ThisNPC, Enemy ) -- 날개 파괴 --ThisNPC:BreakPart(2, Enemy) end
function NPC_111034:phase3_debuff( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- 랜덤으로 캐릭터에게 디버프사용 --GLog( "NPC_111034:phase3_debuff\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88024 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88025 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88020 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( 88022 )
local NewEnemy = ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_1 ) then return end if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_2 ) then return end
--ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$COLT_0111034_154") ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_1, NewEnemy ) NewEnemy:RemoveBuff( 88030 ) NewEnemy:RemoveBuff( 88033 ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_111034.TalIdPhase3_2, Enemy )
end
function NPC_111034:OnYell(RequestNPC, TargetActor) this:Assist(RequestNPC) end
function NPC_111034:OnFinishAndAggroSwap( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) -- 머리부분 --return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) return NPC_111034:AccDamage(true, HitInfo) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) -- 뿔 --return NPC_110011:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) return NPC_111034:AccDamage(true, HitInfo) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_2(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_3(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_4(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_5(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_6(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_7(HitInfo) return NPC_111034:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_111034:OnHitCapsule_1_8(HitInfo) -- 페이즈 변경에 따라 날개가 부서진다(0.6, 0.8은 보스의 HP 60%, 80%)
local HPPer = this:GetHP() / this:GetMaxHP() local ThisNPC = HitInfo.Victim
if( HPPer < 0.75 ) then this:BreakPart(2, HitInfo.Victim) elseif( HPPer < 0.85 ) then this:BreakPart(3, HitInfo.Victim) end
HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage/1.8
return HitInfo
end
function NPC_111034:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) -- 몸통 부분에 타격데미지 외에는 25% 데미지만 들어간다
if( HitInfo.Type == DA_SLASH or HitInfo.Type == DA_PIERCE ) then HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage/5 end return HitInfo end
function NPC_111034:AccDamage(bHead, dHitInfo) -- 타격만 데미지 적용된다
local ThisNPC = dHitInfo.Victim local LimitValue = ThisNPC:GetMaxHP()/10
if( dHitInfo.Type == DA_SLASH or dHitInfo.Type == DA_PIERCE ) then dHitInfo.Damage = dHitInfo.Damage/5 end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) + dHitInfo.Damage ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) + dHitInfo.Damage )
if(ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) > 1300) then -- 머리를 때려 일정 데미지가 쌓이면 페인모션이 나온다 ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103408 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, 0 ) end
if(ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) > LimitValue) then -- 머리를 때려 일정 데미지가 쌓이면 뿔이 부서진다 ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 211103410 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart(1, dHitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 ) end
return dHitInfo end
